input: What is the total revenue from sales in 2023?
expected_output: SELECT SUM(revenue) FROM sales WHERE YEAR(date) = 2023

input: How many orders were placed last month?
expected_output: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE MONTH(date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE) - 1

input: List products with price greater than 100
Get the average salary by department
expected_output: SELECT department, AVG(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY department
